alert.note: Alert for Attala; Carroll; Choctaw; Montgomery; Webster (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued December 14 at 1:50AM CST until December 14 at 2:45AM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Choctaw County in central Mississippi... Southeastern Carroll County in north central Mississippi... Northeastern Attala County in central Mississippi... Webster County in north central Mississippi... Montgomery County in north central Mississippi... * Until 245 AM CST. * At 150 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Vaiden, or 8 miles southeast of Winona, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Poplar Creek around 155 AM CST. Kilmichael around 200 AM CST. Lodi around 210 AM CST. Eupora around 225 AM CST. Bellefontaine around 230 AM CST. Sherwood around 235 AM CST. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include French Camp, Walthall and Weir. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 AM CST for central and north central Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
